about_the_game:
A New Animal Fable

One day it came out of nowhere
In one of our laboratories, a red mud was born.

At first it was just a small amount, but as if it had a mind of its own
The red mud quickly invaded the lab and multiplied

The red mud swallowed the laboratory, the city, and the country

The red mud covered the surface of the earth, and various creatures died.
Civilizations that had lost their masters were eroded by the red mud and crumbled one by one.

Time passed, and those who escaped underground continued to live in fear of the red mud's daily erosion.

This is the story of a group of animals who live in such a harsh environment without losing sight of themselves.

Set in a devastated world, this is the story of the adventures of "Jet," a cat, and his friend "Gripper," a frog, as they set out on a journey in search of a new world for them.

To move and attack, use the mouse to pull back "Jet" and release him.
Pull back and release "Gripper" to use his long tongue to attract distant objects and turn switches on and off, which will help you in your adventures.


This is the demo version of MEOW FRONTIER.
You can proceed from the beginning of the story to a part of the story.
detailed_description:
A New Animal Fable

One day it came out of nowhere
In one of our laboratories, a red mud was born.

At first it was just a small amount, but as if it had a mind of its own
The red mud quickly invaded the lab and multiplied

The red mud swallowed the laboratory, the city, and the country

The red mud covered the surface of the earth, and various creatures died.
Civilizations that had lost their masters were eroded by the red mud and crumbled one by one.

Time passed, and those who escaped underground continued to live in fear of the red mud's daily erosion.

This is the story of a group of animals who live in such a harsh environment without losing sight of themselves.

Set in a devastated world, this is the story of the adventures of "Jet," a cat, and his friend "Gripper," a frog, as they set out on a journey in search of a new world for them.

To move and attack, use the mouse to pull back "Jet" and release him.
Pull back and release "Gripper" to use his long tongue to attract distant objects and turn switches on and off, which will help you in your adventures.


This is the demo version of MEOW FRONTIER.
You can proceed from the beginning of the story to a part of the story.
developers: 株式会社モーンガータ
name: MEOW FRONTIER demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 / Radeon HD 5850
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

publishers: 株式会社モーンガータ
short_description: MEOW FRONTIER" is an action game controlled only with the mouse. Anyone can enjoy the simple controls using only the mouse. Control "Jet," a cat, and "Gripper," a fellow frog, and set out on an adventurous journey in a devastated world.
